---
title: "Inspect GBMap core"
output: html_document
date: "2024-04-30"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Seurat)
library(harmony)
library(SeuratDisk)
```

```{r}
wd <- "CellTypist/"
```

```{r}
GBMap_core <- readRDS(paste0(wd,"GBMap_core.rds"))
```

```{r}
SaveH5Seurat(GBMap_core, filename = paste0(wd,"GBMap_core.h5Seurat"))

```

```{r}
Convert(paste0(wd,"GBMap_core.h5Seurat"), dest = "h5ad")
```
